title: Spectacular Slovakia #1: Bratislava vs. Vienna
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
In the first episode of the Spectacular Slovakia podcast, author of the 2009 edition of the eponymous travel guide, James Thomson, will give listeners insider tips on how to make the best of your trip to Bratislava. James has recently moved back to Bratislava after living for some time in Vienna and will reveal why he left the world’s most liveable city for the Slovak capital.

Spectacular Slovakia travel podcast is the latest addition to our range of travel-related products.
http://shop.spectator.sme.sk/spectacular_slovakia_travel_guide
itunes:subtitle: In the first episode of the Spectacular Slovakia …
